you have your work cut out for you, this torrent is not even close to being called a will smith collection. you dont even have independance day or bad boys listed, 2 of his biggest movies.

Yea, sorry, I should have wrote something in the description about being a "starter" collection, then put in a disclaimer at the bottom about not being complete for all of those who don't understand what starter means, I'll try harder next time to be blatently open with all the obvious for those who need it.
